attributes.action: cease destroying this beautiful country that he clearly hates and go and live somewhere that he likes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Messrs Blair and Brown must hate this country or why else would they go to such lengths to destroy it - handing it over to criminals and benefits fraudsters, desecrating our International Reputation, making our education system a laughable stock, committing our ill-equipped troops to a dubious war, denying our troops a civilised homecoming, cow-towing to France and Germany over the EU, etc, etc, etc, the list is endless.

If you both hate the UK so much, go and live somewhere else.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
